quest.name: Spriggan Scramble
journal:
Motte looks at you with a twinkle in her eye.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.

Motte invites you to play the Spriggan Scramble, one of the activities set up for Hatching-tide. She explains that it is a tallying game in three rounds with different levels of difficulty, and should you clear them all, you will receive a prize. Head over to the beginner eggsaminer to begin the game.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.

The beginner eggsaminer provides you with further details for the activity before letting loose a handful of spriggans who scamper between the partitions. As you have confidently counted their eggs with ease, head over to the intermediate eggsaminer for a more respectable challenge.

The intermediate eggsaminer adds another egg design to the mix and more spriggans to the fray, but your impeccable memory has again reigned supreme. Head over to the advanced eggsaminer for the final round.

Although your focus falters slightly under the advanced eggsaminer's intimidating personality, you were able to steel yourself and pick out every egg. Return to Motte and inform her you have successfully completed all three rounds.
Motte is amazed by your egg counting abilities, confessing even she was unable to pass the advanced round. Speak to her again should you feel the pressing need to count your eggs before they hatch.

dialogue.name: MOTTE
dialogue.text: Hello there, Forename. Do you see those colorful partitions in front of the amphitheatre? I painted them myself for the Spriggan Scramble! Surely you'll indulge me and play it?

dialogue.name: MOTTE
dialogue.text: It's a tallying game. You will need to use your keen observation to count how many eggs were carried by a group of scampering spriggans.

dialogue.name: MOTTE
dialogue.text: There are three degrees of difficulty─beginner, intermediate, and advanced. Once you complete a round, you must proceed to the next until you have successfully challenged all three. When you have done so, return to me and I will reward you with a prize. Good luck!

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFC02131
dialogue.text: Considering how quickly you blazed through the beginner's step, I would say you are ready to speak to the handsome-looking lad down the road.

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFD02131
dialogue.text: You're done with this round, so go and speak with the eggsaminer across from the amphitheatre. Though I warn you, my fellow Dreamer takes her egg counting very seriously.

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFF02131
dialogue.text: I underestimated your skill at spotting spriggans, adventurer. Have you considered becoming a Dreamer? Spending day after day, training and chasing the little dust bunnies around the meadows. Think of the possibilities.

dialogue.name: MOTTE
dialogue.text: I'll be right here watching you, Forename! Good luck!

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFC02131
dialogue.text: Ah, a challenger appears! Well met, misssir.

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFC02131
dialogue.text: Did Motte explain this activity to you? Between these plank boards will be five spriggans. Each spriggan will be carrying an expertly embellished egg. For this round, the eggs will have only two motifs.

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFC02131
dialogue.text: Be sure to pay close attention! After the spriggans finish their scramble, I will ask you to tell me how many of each you saw. If you are correct, I will send you off to the next round.

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFC02131
dialogue.text: But first, I must make sure you are properly acquainted with the designs.

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFC02131
dialogue.text: A pristine white egg looks like this...

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFC02131
dialogue.text: ...and a vibrant blue egg looks like this!

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFC02131
dialogue.text: Well, then. Are you ready? Release the spriggans!

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFC02131
dialogue.text: Did any slip past you, I wonder? Only one way to find out.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: How many pristine white eggs did you see?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: How many vibrant blue eggs did you see?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: How many brilliant yellow eggs did you see?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: How many midnight black eggs did you see?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: One.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Two.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Three.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Four.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Five.

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFC02131
dialogue.text: Hmmm... You saw onetwothreefourfivesixseven pristine white and onetwothreefourfivesixseven of vibrant blue?

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: Is that your final answer?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Yes

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: No

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFC02131
dialogue.text: Well, then, let's see if you were right...

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFC02131
dialogue.text: But of course you were! I knew you would be.

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFC02131
dialogue.text: You won this time, adventurer. Off to the intermediate round you go!

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFC02131
dialogue.text: You were so close! But I'm afraid that is incorrect. Spriggans are quick, so keep your eyes on their prize. Feel free to take the challenge again.

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFD02131
dialogue.text: Passed the beginner's round, did you? Although we both know it is not necessarily a feat. How's about we raise the bar a bit higher, eh?

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFD02131
dialogue.text: In this round, six sprightly spriggans will carry eggs decorated with three different designs.

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFD02131
dialogue.text: If you have properly warmed up, then we shall commence with the counting.

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFD02131
dialogue.text: Ah yes, I nearly forgot. Before we begin, let me introduce the new egg design.

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFD02131
dialogue.text: In addition to the ones you saw in the beginner's round, this brilliant yellow egg will also make a debut.

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFD02131
dialogue.text: I am lifting the doors, so prepare yourself. Ready...steady...go!

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFD02131
dialogue.text: How did you fare? Were you able to count all of them?

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFD02131
dialogue.text: Let me understand this correctly; you say there were onetwothreefourfivesixseven of pristine white, onetwothreefourfivesixseven of vibrant blue, and onetwothreefourfivesixseven of brilliant yellow?

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFD02131
dialogue.text: Well, I must say...

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFD02131
dialogue.text: You are indeed correct! Quite a sharp memory you have there, adventurer! But you'll have to do better if you want to pass the advanced round.

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFD02131
dialogue.text: When you're ready, proceed to the advanced eggsaminer in front of the amphitheatre for the final challenge.

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFD02131
dialogue.text: You almost had it, but one or two have slipped your grasp. Too bad. The good news is you can always try again. I'll be waiting.

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFF02131
dialogue.text: Judging by your smug look of satisfaction, it appears you have cleared the intermediate round. Well, counting on your fingers won't save you this time, adventurer.

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFF02131
dialogue.text: There will be no mercy in this round. I have a narrower fence, eight bouncing spriggans, and not one, not two, not three, but four different eggs!

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFF02131
dialogue.text: Think you have what it takes? Come on, then. Let us see for ourselves.

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFF02131
dialogue.text: Before we begin, I will show you the new egg. Be sure to take a good look.

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFF02131
dialogue.text: In addition to the other three you have seen, this midnight black egg will also appear.

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFF02131
dialogue.text: You look confident, so I'll be releasing the little scamps all at once. Don't blink.

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFF02131
dialogue.text: Tell me. How many were there?

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFF02131
dialogue.text: So, you say the number of eggs is as follows: onetwothreefourfivesixseven of pristine white, onetwothreefourfivesixseven of vibrant blue, onetwothreefourfivesixseven of brilliant yellow, and onetwothreefourfivesixseven of midnight black, yes?

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFF02131
dialogue.text: Are you suuure?

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFF02131
dialogue.text: Because you're absolutely right! Nothing gets past you, I see. You've beaten all three rounds, so return to Motte for your reward!

dialogue.name: EGGHUNTINGSTAFFF02131
dialogue.text: Because you're wrong! Sorry! I'll save you the shame and call this a practice round. Let me know when you're ready for the real challenge.

dialogue.name: MOTTE
dialogue.text: Wow, you were able to pass the final round? Even I wasn't able to do it!

dialogue.name: MOTTE
dialogue.text: Allow me to present you with a fortune egg as your reward, and let me know if you want to play again!
